original_text: Then the priest must sacrifice the male sheep as a friendship offering to the Lord. He must offer the basket of bread. He must give the grain offering and the drink offering with it.
korean_text: 화목제물로 숫양에 무교병 한 광주리를 아울러 여호와께 드리고 그 소제와 전제를 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: Then the priest must sacrifice the male sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장은 숫양을 제물로 바쳐야 합니다

sentences.original_text: as a friendship offering to the Lord
He must offer the basket of bread
He must give the grain offering
and the drink offering with it
